20110118235122.000|20110118235124.000|CC1|WAS KILLED AND MY SON SHOT IN   
20110118235124.000|20110118235127.000|CC1|THE HEAD, FIVE OTHER FAMILIES   
20110118235127.000|20110118235129.000|CC1|LOST SOMEONE AND 20 WERE        
20110118235129.000|20110118235131.000|CC1|INJURED, COLIN FERGUSON ONLY HAD
20110118235131.000|20110118235132.000|CC1|CLIPS THAT HAD 15 BULLETS IN    
20110118235132.000|20110118235134.000|CC1|EACH CLIP.                      
20110118235134.000|20110118235137.000|CC1|WHEN HE WENT TO RELOAD, THREE   
20110118235137.000|20110118235139.000|CC1|PEOPLE TACKLED HIM, THE SAME    
20110118235139.000|20110118235140.000|CC1|THING THAT HAPPENED OUT IN      
20110118235140.000|20110118235141.000|CC1|ARIZONA.

20110118235142.000|20110118235144.000|CC1|PUT IN ANOTHER CLIP WITH 33
